Public Functions

virtual ~DzUndoItem ()
virtual void redo ()
virtual int size () const
virtual void undo ()=0

Detailed Description

Base class for an undo item that can be pushed onto the undo stack.

Directly available using the global pointer dzUndoStack.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

DzUndoItem::~DzUndoItem (  )  [inline, virtual]

Destructor.

Member Function Documentation

void DzUndoItem::redo (  )  [inline, virtual]

All derived classes override this to implement their redo.

int DzUndoItem::size (  )  const [inline, virtual]

All derived classes override this to report their size (in bytes). This is used to make sure the undo buffer doesn't get too large.

void DzUndoItem::undo (  )  [pure virtual]

All derived classes override this to implement their undo.
